entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning.
